V.iii.4.A.4.a
.
Deviated Nasal Septum
SC cannot be granted for a deviation of the nasal septum unless trauma is shown.
Reference
:Â  For more information on traumatic nasal septum deviation see
38 CFR 4.97, DC 6502
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A - Respiratory Conditions
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 4, Section A
